nodes.text: Zeva's ship was a massive Centurion-class battlecruiser owned by Zeva Bliss, the leader of the Spice Runners of Kijimi. Bliss used the battlecruiser to travel to the planet Judakann and collect her daughter Zorii Bliss and Poe Dameron and return them to Kijimi to become full members of the Spice Runners.
